description:
Connect the UI to Claude API for screenshot analysis.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Create app/api/analyze/route.ts API endpoint
- Adapt existing lib/claude.ts for Next.js:
  - Remove React Native specific imports
  - Use Next.js server environment
  - Keep retry logic, caching, error handling
- API route accepts screenshots (URLs or base64)
- Sends to Claude with analysis prompt
- Returns structured JSON response
- Store results in Supabase reference_apps.analysis
- Progress callback for long-running analysis
- Handle rate limits and errors gracefully

IMPORTANT: ANTHROPIC_API_KEY must be server-side only (no NEXT_PUBLIC_ prefix)
